sub_title: Professor at Leiden Institute of Chemistry
summary:
I have been an active Inorganic and Coordination Chemist,at Leiden Universitry, with a focus on metals and ligands, and their application in molecular materials, homogeneous catalysis, metals in mdicine, platinum anticancer chemistry.
As a consultant I continue these activities after my retirement from Leiden University; these activities include chemistry evaluations for governments, companies, universities and research councils for assessments and evaluations.

Specialties: Activity of metal ions in living systems, in the environment and in drugs. Broad overview of Chemistry, Ligands and Metals.
